articles.title: New GraphQL Inspector and upcoming features
articles.description: See what's new and shape the future of GraphQL Inspector together! It's entirely open-sourced!

articles.title: Schema Change Notifications in GraphQL Inspector
articles.description: Stay up to date with changes in your GraphQL Schema. Receive notifications on Slack, Discord or even via WebHooks.

articles.title: Validate GraphQL Schema - Continuous Integration & Delivery Pipeline
articles.description: Detect breaking changes and identify possible issues in GraphQL API with GraphQL Inspector

articles.title: Multiple environments and endpoints in GraphQL Inspector
articles.description: Use different variants of GraphQL schema.  Live and running GraphQL API as the source of truth of a schema.

articles.title: Enable Remote Control in GraphQL Inspector
articles.description: Intercept schema changes via HTTP and decide which changes are acceptable which are not and all of this through a serverless function.

articles.title: Introducing: GraphQL Inspector
articles.description: Prevent breaking changes. Find broken operations. Get Schema Coverage. Check deprecated usage and type duplicates. All as part of your CI process.
